name: Stockade
description: A defensive barrier made of wooden stakes provides basic protection for settlements or military camps. The simple construction makes it quick to build, while the wooden nature makes it vulnerable to fire and requires constant maintenance.
atmosphere: Tall wooden stakes form a defensive perimeter while guard towers overlook the protected area. Fresh timber and earth scents fill the air as maintenance crews repair weak points. Simple but effective barrier provides basic protection. Gates control access through the wooden walls.
